recipes.title: Mexican Tuna Braised over Flatbread (Spicy)
recipes.description: A dinner-friendly Mexican dish featuring tuna and flatbread with a spicy twist.
steps: Prep ingredients: wash produce and crushed aromatics.
Braised the tuna with salt, pepper, and spicy profile until nearly cooked.
Cook the flatbread separately according to package directions; drain well.
Sauté vegetables in fat until tender-crisp.
Combine tuna, vegetables, and flatbread; add sauce and simmer to coat.
Taste and adjust seasoning (salt, acid, heat).
Rest 3–5 minutes, garnish, and serve warm.
recipes.author: Auto-generated dataset
